means: 迅速的传播、生长或发展

word_mean: 〔流行病〕流行，流行性的：突然发生的若干病例数，其发生率显然高于通常预期数
尤指传染病，但亦用于以突发形式发生的其他任何病伤或与健康有关的事项

sentence.Network_en: Drug experts say it could spell the end of the crack epidemic.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁毒专家说它可能会结束强效可卡因吸食泛滥的局面。

sentence.Network_en: Health officials have successfully confined the epidemic to the Tabatinga area.
sentence.Network_cn: 卫生官员成功地将疫情控制在塔巴廷加地区。

sentence.Network_en: The major impact of this epidemic worldwide is yet to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种传染病在世界范围内的重大影响还未完全显现。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (as an adjective): from French épidémique, from épidémie, via late Latin from Greek epidēmia 'prevalence of disease', from epidēmios 'prevalent', from epi 'upon' + dēmos 'the people'

entry.def: If there is an epidemic of a particular disease somewhere, it affects a very large number of people there and spreads quickly to other areas.

example.ex: A flu epidemic is sweeping through Moscow.
example.tran: 一场流感正席卷莫斯科。

entry.def: If an activity that you disapprove of is increasing or spreading rapidly, you can refer to this as an epidemic of that activity.

example.ex: Drug experts say it could spell the end of the crack epidemic.
example.tran: 禁毒专家说它可能会结束强效可卡因吸食泛滥的局面。

means.word_mean: 1. a widespread outbreak of an infectious disease; many people are infected at the same time
1. (especially of medicine) of disease or anything resembling a disease; attacking or affecting many individuals in a community or a population simultaneously;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"在……上,在……周围,在……后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+derm皮+al……的→在皮上面→表皮的
epidemiology[n.流行病学]+ist专家或人→epidemiologist[研究]传染病的学者
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+graph写,刻→刻上的话→碑文
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+logu说+e→在后面说的话→后记
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+s+od路+e→在路上→一段经历;片段
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+taph墓→墓上的[字]→墓志铭

stems_affixes.value_cn: [贬低人的]短语或形容词,绰号
stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+thet放→放在名字上的另一个名字→侮辱性的称呼
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+tome卷册→[一卷书后的]梗概

stems_affixes.type_exp: =people 表示"人民,人们" demo- popul-

stems_affixes.word_buile: en在……内+dem人民+ic……的→在人民之中→地方性的
epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
pan广泛的+dem人民+ic……的→人民广泛[染病]→广为流行的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 蛊惑民心的策略和手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: dem人民,人们+agog引导,蛊惑+y→n.蛊惑民心的策略和手段

Sentence.sentence: If the virus had been capable of spreading through the air, or if one infected person had unknowingly entered a large population center, Ebola might have become a worldwide epidemic.
With no known vaccination or cure available, it seems only a matter of time until another epidemic erupts
Another Ebola epidemic may erupt sooner or later.

sentences.en: The Sanitary Board tries to stamp out the epidemic.
sentences.cn: 卫生局试图消灭这种流行病。

jushi.english: The Sanitary Board tries to stamp out the epidemic.
jushi.chinese: 卫生局试图消灭这种流行病。

jushi.english: There has recently been an epidemic of car stealing.
jushi.chinese: 汽车被盗案件近来频繁发生。
